Name: Sairagul
description:
Sairagul has repaid her loan, having invested the funds as intended. She is thankful to Kiva and to everyone who helped her with financing. Sairagul's farm has two cows and 65 sheep. Her monthly profit is about 14,000 som (KGS).

In order to further develop her business, Sairagul has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,00 som (KGS) in order to buy livestock for increasing her livestock numbers. Sairagul plans to use the funds from the loan to develop her farm.
